title: White-Water River Rafting Adventure
description: An exhilarating rafting experience in the rapids just outside Bangalore.
fullDescription: Experience the thrill of river rafting with expert guides. All safety gear is provided and you will navigate class III & IV rapids with a professional team. Great for beginners and seasoned paddlers alike.

title: Sunset Kayak Tour on the Coast
description: Enjoy a serene sunset kayak tour along the scenic Goa shoreline.
fullDescription: Paddle through calm coastal waters, spot marine life, and enjoy a drinks break at sunset. All kayaks and safety equipment provided, suitable for all ages and skill levels.

title: Mountain Trek & Camp Experience
description: A two-day guided mountain trek with a night under the stars at our wilderness camp.
fullDescription: Join our experienced trek guides as you climb through pine forests and alpine meadows. Camp overnight with bonfire, dinner, breakfast and sunrise yoga included. Good fitness level recommended.
